TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSFederationSerializer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods to convert a WS-Federation message to and objects, which are WS-Trust protocol specific.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public WSFederationSerializer ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: WSFederationSerializer();

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The new instance serializes WS-Federation messages into WS-Trust Feb 2005 protocol messages; an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005RequestSerializer> class is used to serialize requests and an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005ResponseSerializer> class is used to serialize responses.

Docs.param: An opened on the response XML.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the namespace of the response XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The request and response messages are serialized based on the namespace of the response XML (the appropriate WS-Trust serializers are used based on the namespace).
